attributes.action: USE LOTTERY PROFITS TO FINANCE THE NATIONAL HEALTH SERVICE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lottery profits should fund the National Health Service.  This would substantially improve our hospitals.  In addition hospital trusts should reduce the number of 'Middle Managers' that are sucking hospitals dry with substantial salaries.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
